text: Punks Not Dead is the debut studio album by Scottish punk rock band, The Exploited. Punks Not Dead was released in April 1981. They made the album as a reaction to critics who thought that the genre was dead, and was also against popular trends such as New Wave, hardcore and post-punk. The album is regarded as one of the definitive Oi! albums. The album peaked at #20 on the UK charts in May of that year. ==Songs== Side one Side two 2001 Re-release ==References== Category:1981 albums Category:The Exploited albums Category:Punk albums
title: Punks Not Dead
